amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to prevent implementation of the bill's provisions until after the EPA Administrator certifies that its own PFAS Action Plan is completed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to prevent implementation of the bill's provisions until after the EPA Administrator certifies that its own PFAS Action Plan is completed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Balderson amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 239 (Roll no. 10).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Balderson.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Balderson amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 239 (Roll no. 10).
